name: EightiesFeelThePressure
0:
”Alexa Open Eighties Feel The Pressure”
”Start New Game”
”Prince”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: eighties feel the pressure
des:
This game is the Eighties Edition of Feel the Pressure.

You progress through each level, by answering questions on eighties bands and singers - from the US Top 40.

Some questions are easy, some questions are hard.

You need 10 correct answers in a row, to win the game.

Enjoy!

Premium Products
-------------------------
There are 2 premium products you can purchase:

1 – Perfectly Polite Expansion Pack: This is a one-time purchase. 
This permanently removes the snarky comments, jokes, screaming and chicken noises, from the game.

2 – Unlimited Time Expansion Pack: This is a one-time purchase. 
This permanently allows you unlimited time to answer the questions. 
You can still say “Don’t Know” if you want to.

Feedback
-------------
I hope you’ll love Eighties Feel the Pressure. However, if you have any issues, please let me know on the Feel the Pressure Facebook page, or by e-mail at animal.letters@gmail.com, and I’ll do everything in my power to make it better for you.

More games? 
------------------
If you'd like to see more games by the author, just type "Drew Cosgrove" into the search bar on the Alexa App or Amazon Skills page.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
